document.heading: Real Property Tax Rates for Tax Year 1980 Act

history.narrative: Law 3-40, the “Real Property Tax Rates for Tax Year 1980 Act,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-176, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 25, 1979 and October 9, 1979, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 26, 1979, it was assigned Act No. 3-112 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
